definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: The rotating slip ring is insulated from the shaft by a laminated plastic bushing .
sentences.chinese: 旋轉滑環是用片狀塑料襯套與軸絕緣的。

sentences.english: Using vernier calipers , measure the slip ring diameter.
sentences.chinese: 用卡尺，測量滑環的直徑。

sentences.english: The terminals of the rotor winding are connected to three slip rings.
sentences.chinese: 轉子繞組的各端與三個滑環連接。

sentences.english: The structure and application of hydrostatic slipring are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了靜壓滑環的結構特點及其應用。

sentences.english: The two chief problems in installing the sliprings in the bullet seemed to be the temperature problem and the drive problem.
sentences.chinese: 把滑環裝在排氣錐體中的兩個主要問題是溫度和傳動。

sentences.english: Equipped with a closed transmission slip ring, cable is not wrapped, good electrical conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 配置封閉式輸電滑環，電纜線不纏繞，導電良好。

sentences.english: Ways of improving slip rings are cleared.
sentences.chinese: 明確改善滑環性能的途徑。
